messages.title: Luciana's Pledge to You
messages.content: When elected as your MP, I will work tirelessly to ensure that the people of Liverpool Wavertree are at the heart of all I do.

messages.title: We're all backing Luciana Berger
messages.content: Luciana has the enthusiasm and dedication we need at a time of great challenges.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Luciana will fight to protect jobs and services at the Royal Liverpool Hospital, Broadgreen and Alder Hey.

issues.health: Luciana will fight to protect jobs and services at the Royal Liverpool Hospital, Broadgreen and Alder Hey.

endorsements.endorsement: Luciana has the enthusiasm and dedication we need at a time of great challenges.
